DOC.brief_title: Phase II , 2nd Line Melanoma - RAND Monotherapy
DOC.criteria: Subjects must previously treat one line systemic anticancer therapy ( nonexperimental experimental ) metastatic disease , relapse , fail respond ( CR PR ) tolerate regimen . If treatment administer adjuvant and/or neoadjuvant therapy , subject must document disease progression last treatment also receive one additional line systemic therapy metastatic disease . Men woman , least 18 year age Ocular mucosal melanoma Complete surgical resection identifiable site disease Symptomatic brain metastasis .
